bdi4jade.plan.planbody

Class AbstractPlanBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.core.behaviours.Behaviour
      • bdi4jade.plan.planbody.AbstractPlanBody
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GoalListener, PlanBody, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeliefGoalPlanBody, ParallelGoalPlanBody, SequentialGoalPlanBody

    public abstract class AbstractPlanBody
extends jade.core.behaviours.Behaviour
implements PlanBody
    This class provides an almost complete implementation of the PlanBody interface. It represents a plan that has been instantiated to be executed.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • dispatchGoal

        public void dispatchGoal(Goal goal)
        Description copied from interface: PlanBody
        Dispatches a goal to be achieved. It is added as a top level agent goal, that is, the dispatched goal is independent of the goal that this plan body is trying to achieve.
        Specified by:
        dispatchGoal in interface PlanBody
        Parameters:
        goal - the goal to be dispatched.
        See Also:
        PlanBody.dispatchGoal(Goal)

        public void dispatchSubgoal(Goal subgoal)
        Description copied from interface: PlanBody

      • done

        public final boolean done()
        Indicates to the JADE platform that this behavior/plan body finished its execution. If getEndState() returns null, it returns false, as the plan body has not reached a final state. It returns true otherwise.
        Specified by:
        done in class jade.core.behaviours.Behaviour
        Returns:
        false if getEndState() returns null, true otherwise.
        See Also:
        Behaviour.done()

        the belief base containing the capability beliefs.
        See Also:

      • getEndState

        public Plan.EndState getEndState()
        Returns the end state of plan. A null value means that the plan is still executing.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the end state of the plan.

      • getGoalEvent

        public GoalEvent getGoalEvent()
        Returns a goal event from the queue. If the queue is empty, the plan body execution is blocked.
        Specified by:
        getGoalEvent in interface PlanBody
        Returns:
        the goal event or null if the queue is empty.

      • getGoalEvent

        public GoalEvent getGoalEvent(boolean block)
        Returns a goal event from the queue. If the queue is empty, the plan body execution is blocked if the parameter passed to this method is true.
        Specified by:
        getGoalEvent in interface PlanBody
        Parameters:
        block - true if the plan body must be blocked if the queue is empty.
        Returns:
        the goal event or null if the queue is empty.

      • getGoalEvent

        public GoalEvent getGoalEvent(long ms)
        Returns a goal event from the queue. If the queue is empty, the plan body execution is blocked for the specified milliseconds.
        Specified by:
        getGoalEvent in interface PlanBody
        Parameters:
        ms - the maximum amount of time that the behavior must be blocked.
        Returns:
        the goal event or null if the queue is empty.

      • getPlan

        public final Plan getPlan()
        Returns the Plan that is associated with this plan body.
        Specified by:
        getPlan in interface PlanBody
        Returns:
        the plan.

      • goalPerformed

        public void goalPerformed(GoalEvent event)
        Receives the notification that a goal event has occurred. If the event has a finished status, it is added to the event queue, which can be retrieved by invoking the getGoalEvent() method, and restarts the plan body execution.
        Specified by:
        goalPerformed in interface GoalListener
        Parameters:
        event - the goal event that occurred.
        See Also:
        GoalListener.goalPerformed(bdi4jade.event.GoalEvent)

      • init

        public final void init(Plan plan,
        Intention intention)
                throws PlanInstantiationException
        Initializes this plan body. It associates this plan body with a plan definition (Plan) and an Intention. If this plan body has already been initialized, this method throws a PlanInstantiationException. It also sets up the plan input parameters based on the goal input parameters.
        Specified by:
        init in interface PlanBody
        Parameters:
        plan - the plan associated this this plan body.
        intention - the intention that this plan instance have to achieve.
        Throws:
        PlanInstantiationException - if this plan body has already been initialized.

      • setEndState

        protected final void setEndState(Plan.EndState endState)
        Sets the end state of plan. A null value means that the plan is still executing. If the plan body has come to an end state, it invokes the method to set the output parameters of the goal, in case the plan body implements the OutputPlanBody interface (this is invoked only once), or sets up the goal inputs parameters based on the plan body output parameters. If an error occurs during this setting process, a warn is shown, but no exception is thrown. If the plan body has come to an end state, it drops all subgoals, in case they are still trying to be achieved.
        Parameters:
        endState - the endState to set.

      • start

        public final void start()
        Starts the plan body, by adding it as to the agent as a Behaviour .
        Specified by:
        start in interface PlanBody

      • stop

        public final void stop()
        Stops the plan body execution. It drops all plan body subgoals. If the body implements the DisposablePlanBody, it invokes the method to about the plan body, so it can perform finalizations.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface PlanBody
